data:
Name: `SafeWork AI`
Idea: `SafeWork AI is an AI-powered education platform designed to provide workers with comprehensive training on Occupational Risk Prevention. The platform leverages artificial intelligence to deliver personalized learning experiences, offering interactive modules, real-time assessments, and adaptive learning paths tailored to individual needs and job roles. Targeted at industries with high workplace risks, such as construction, manufacturing, and healthcare, SafeWork AI aims to enhance safety knowledge, reduce workplace accidents, and promote a culture of proactive risk management.`
